languages.text: Вернул{mf||а} Соломона к служению Лекс Империалис, развеяв его сомнения.
Returned Solomorne to serving the Lex Imperialis, dispelling his doubts.
languages.original_text: Вернул{mf||а} Соломона к служению Лекс Империалис, развеяв его сомнения.

traits.locale_text: Returned Solomorne to serving the Lex Imperialis, dispelling his doubts.

languages.text: ソロモーンをレックス・インペリアへの奉仕に立ち返らせ、迷いを晴らしてやった。
languages.original_text: Returned Solomorne to serving the Lex Imperialis, dispelling his doubts.

traits.locale_text: ソロモーンをレックス・インペリアへの奉仕に立ち返らせ、迷いを晴らしてやった。

languages.text: Solomorne in den Dienst des Lex Imperia zurückgebracht und seine Zweifel zerstreut.
languages.original_text: Returned Solomorne to serving the Lex Imperialis, dispelling his doubts.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne in den Dienst des Lex Imperia zurückgebracht und seine Zweifel zerstreut.

languages.text: Vous avez dissipé les doutes de Solomorne, qui va continuer de servir la Lex Imperialis.
languages.original_text: Returned Solomorne to serving the Lex Imperialis, dispelling his doubts.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez dissipé les doutes de Solomorne, qui va continuer de servir la Lex Imperialis.

languages.text: Disipaste las dudas de Solomorne y le persuadiste de continuar sirviendo a la Lex Imperialis.
languages.original_text: Returned Solomorne to serving the Lex Imperialis, dispelling his doubts.

traits.locale_text: Disipaste las dudas de Solomorne y le persuadiste de continuar sirviendo a la Lex Imperialis.

languages.text: 你打消了索罗蒙的疑虑，让他继续为帝国律法效力。
languages.original_text: Returned Solomorne to serving the Lex Imperialis, dispelling his doubts.

traits.locale_text: 你打消了索罗蒙的疑虑，让他继续为帝国律法效力。

languages.text: Solomorne'un aklındaki şüpheleri ortadan kaldırarak tekrar Lex İmperialis'e hizmet etmesini sağladın.
languages.original_text: Returned Solomorne to serving the Lex Imperialis, dispelling his doubts.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne'un aklındaki şüpheleri ortadan kaldırarak tekrar Lex İmperialis'e hizmet etmesini sağlar.
